pageContent: Introduction: The main objective was to evaluate feasibility, toxicity and biochemical control rates of salvage external beam radiotherapy (EBRT) in recurrent localized prostate cancer after high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) as primary therapy.

metaData.source:
[Salvage treatments for prostatic radiation failure]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/20801701/
